intension: Design a flyer for a glamorous night party with a black dress code. The event will take place at 5801 W Juno St, Wichita on 12 Oct at 7 PM. The party is hosted by Cinematic.US and has a sparkling premiere theme.
globalcaption: The image features a woman wearing a black dress, standing in front of a red background. She appears to be the main focus of the scene.
